Name: Para-Lax
About the game: You wake up in a strange world and remember nothing but your name: Lax... A farmer asks you for help. His dirt has been stolen by ogres! Get it back! Travel through a world filled with traps and hordes of enemies. Use your sword to fight back the goblins. Your ultimate goal is, of course, to bring back all of the farmers dirt that the ogres have stolen. In the game, you can defeat opponents and overcome obstacles through simple game controls. The game convinces with its two-dimensional pixel artstyle. The whole game was created by a game developer and an art designer. This makes the whole game look very indie like and has a nice retro touch.
